Doris Rogers

 
 

Doris Rogers is running for East Ridge City Council
Back to races

This candidate has not completed the survey for our election guide.

About this guide

There are more than 60 candidates and ballot measures in Hamilton County's Nov. 4 election. Over the past few weeks, Nooga.com sent the candidates brief surveys to help voters get a better understanding of the people who want to represent them in federal, state and local governments.
